attributes.action: Time Party, for transparency ask for an independent financial audit of Scotgov
attributes.additional_details: We would like an independent audit so the results can be reviewed with confidence
attributes.background: The Time Party for transparency of government is concerned about the allocation of taxpayers money by the devolved Assembly in Scotland. We request that a full independent financial audit be done to show where money from Scottish  taxpayers and Her Majestys government has been allocated

rejection.details:
Your petition is about something that the Scottish Parliament is responsible for. That means that the UK Government and Parliament can't look into it. 

The Scottish Parliament has its own Public Petitions Committee. If you'd like to send your petition to the Scottish Parliament, you can find out more here:

http://www.scottish.parliament.uk/gettinginvolved/petitions/index.aspx
